function.name: SetUpDsWithScript
function.function-prolog: This function sets up a Directory Server using a script

function-arg-def.name: dsBaseDN
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Base DN (only single base DN supported).

function-arg-def.name: dsDoNotStart
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Do not start server after setup

function-arg-def.name: dsEnableStartTLS
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Enable startTLS, must use dsCertifiacte parameter

function.name: StartDsWithScript
function.function-prolog: This function starts a Directory Server

function-arg-def.name: dsNoDetach
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Do not detach directory server from process

sequence.script:
# define environment variables env = [] env.append('PATH=/bin:/usr/bin:%s' % dsBinPath) env.append('JAVA_HOME=%s' % JAVA_HOME) env.append('OPENDS_JAVA_HOME=%s' % JAVA_HOME)
if instance: sys.path.append("%s/phases/parser" % TESTS_DIR ) from parser import * tuning = instance.getTuning() if tuning.getJavaArgs() != NOT_DEFINED: env.append('OPENDS_JAVA_ARGS=%s' % tuning.getJavaArgs()) name = 'StartDs %s:%s' % (instance.getName(),instance.getLDAPPort()) else: name = 'StartDs'
sequence.call: { 'name' : name, 'location' : location, 'command' : STAFCmd, 'arguments' : STAFCmdParams, 'path' : dsBinPath, 'env' : env, 'fileFd' : fileFd }

function.name: StopDsWithScript
function.function-prolog: This function starts a Directory Server using the script

function-arg-def.name: dsHost
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Directory server hostname or IP address

function-arg-def.name: dsUseSSL
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use SSL for secure communication with the server

function-arg-def.name: dsUseStartTLS
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use StartTLS for secure communication with the server

function-arg-def.name: dsProxyAuthZID
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Use the proxied authorization control with the given authorization ID

function-arg-def.name: dsStopReason
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Reason the server is being stopped or restarted

function-arg-def.name: dsRestart
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Attempt to automatically restart the server once it has stopped

function-arg-def.name: dsStopTime
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Time to begin the shutdown in YYYYMMDDhhmmss format (local time)

function-arg-def.name: expectedRC
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Expected return code value. Default value is 0. Wildcard 'noCheck' to not check the RC

function-arg-def.name: fileFd
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: file descriptor to write message in if needed

sequence.call: { 'name' : 'StopDsWithScript', 'location' : location, 'command' : STAFCmd, 'arguments' : STAFCmdParams, 'path' : dsBinPath, 'expectedRC': expectedRC, 'fileFd' : fileFd }

function.name: ImportLdifWithScript

function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Path to the LDIF file to be imported

function-arg-def.name: dsTemplateFile
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Path to a MakeLDIF template to use to generate the import data

function-arg-def.name: dsAppend
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Append to an existing database rather than overwriting it

function-arg-def.name: dsReplaceExisting
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Replace existing entries when appending to the database

function-arg-def.name: dsBackEnd
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Backend ID for the backend to import

function-arg-def.name: dsBranchDN
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Base DN of a branch to include in the LDIF import

function-arg-def.name: dsIncludeBranch
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Base DN of a branch to include in the LDIF import

function-arg-def.name: dsExcludeBranch
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Base DN of a branch to exclude from the LDIF import

function-arg-def.name: dsIncludeAttribute
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Attribute to include in the LDIF import

function-arg-def.name: dsExcludeAttribute
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Attribute to exclude in the LDIF import

function-arg-def.name: dsIncludeFilter
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Filter to identify entries to include in the LDIF import

function-arg-def.name: dsExcludeFilter
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Filter to identify entries to exclude from the LDIF import

function-arg-def.name: dsRejectFile

function-arg-def.name: dsOverWriteRejects
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Overwrite an existing rejects file rather than appending to it

function-arg-def.name: dsRandomSeed
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Seed for the MakeLDIF random number generator

function-arg-def.name: dsSkipSchemaValidation

function.name: checkOpendsReplication
function.function-prolog: This function uses dsreplication status to check the replication of the topology

function-arg-def.name: instance
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: opends instance object to run the command

function-arg-def.name: expectedRC
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Expected return code value. Default value is 0. Wildcard 'noCheck' to not check the RC

function-arg-def.name: fileFd
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: file descriptor to write message in if needed

sequence.script:
STAFCmdParamsList=[] STAFCmdParams=''
dsBinPath='%s/bin' % (instance.getInstallDir()) STAFCmd='%s/dsreplication' % (dsBinPath)
STAFCmdParamsList.append('status -n') STAFCmdParamsList.append('-h %s' % instance.getHost()) STAFCmdParamsList.append('-p %s' % instance.getLDAPPort()) STAFCmdParamsList.append('-b %s' % suffix.getSuffixDn()) STAFCmdParamsList.append('-I "%s"' % adminDN) STAFCmdParamsList.append('-w "%s"' % adminPwd) STAFCmdParams=' '.join(STAFCmdParamsList)
sequence.call: { 'name' : 'opendsReplicationStatus on %s' % \ instance.getHost(), 'location' : instance.getHost(), 'command' : STAFCmd, 'arguments' : STAFCmdParams, 'path' : dsBinPath, 'fileFd' : fileFd }
